name: peach-angular-dragula
description: Drag and drop so simple it hurts

scripts.build: npm run scripts && npm run styles
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deployment && npm run sync
scripts.deployment: git add dist && npm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -am "Autogenerated pre-deployment commit" && git reset HEAD~2 && git add . && git commit -am "Release $(cat package.json | jq -r .version)" && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
scripts.scripts: jshint . && browserify -s angularDragula -do dist/angular-dragula.js angular-dragula.js && uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/angular-dragula.min.js dist/angular-dragula.js
scripts.styles: stylus node_modules/dragula/dragula.styl --import node_modules/nib -o dist && cleancss dist/dragula.css -o dist/dragula.min.css
scripts.sync: git checkout gh-pages ; git merge master ; git push ; git checkout master

author: Nicolas Bevacqua <nicolasbevacqua@gmail.com> (http://bevacqua.io/)
